activities:
Foot Locker, Inc. may receive personal information from customers who place merchandise orders through our United States- and European Union-based websites and subscribers to our newsletters, promotional initiatives and social network site.  This information may be used for processing orders, communicating with customers and subscribers regarding their orders and any relevant promotions and marketing initiatives, and for statistical purposes.
Human Resources Deptartment of Foot Locker, Inc. receives personal information from Foot Locker, Inc.'s affiliated companies in the EU.  The information is used for employment purposes, such as evaluation of associates' compensation and benefits.
contacttitle1: Senior Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources Data, online data customer data
recoursemech: Foot Locker, Inc. agrees to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs); for Switzerland, we will cooperate with the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
